caption.p: Characterization of commercial pig movements according to the different herd types sites (BS, boar studs; FA, farrowing; FF, farrow-to-finish; FI, finisher; FWP, Farrowing-post-weaning; MU, multiplier; PW, post-weaning; PWF, post-weaningâ€”finishing; SEL, nucleus; SP, small production; TR, trade center; WB, wild boars) ( 18). Circle sizes represent the relative proportions movements of growing pigs (left) and breeding animals (right).
